questions: can my jury date be postponed?
How can I have my jury summons date rescheduled?
How do I go about rescheduling my jury Summons Date?
I need to change my summons date what should I do?
answers: If there is a problem or you have a conflict with the days for which you have been summoned, you may request to have your service rescheduled to a later date via the Juror eResponse Portal. To access the portal, click here
